title: Food Vendors
description: A schema defining a list of food vendors, where each vendor has a name and an object of menu items, with the item name as the key and the price as the value.

items.title: Food Vendor
items.description: Represents a single food vendor and their details.

name.description: The full name of the food vendor.

items.description: An array of food items offered by the vendor.

name.description: The name of the food item.

price.description: The price of the food item, formatted as a string (e.g., '$5.00'). This is an empty string if the price is not listed.
